/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with trees and buildings, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and perspective. Cars and buses are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's vibrant life. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, adding to the overall brightness of the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant and varied, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
